attributes.action: suport the arrest ALL MP's here and now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
suport the arrest ALL MP's here and now  

even those MP'S whose expenses claims appear ok AS they are all suspect of being complicit in a crime  

ALL MP's should be arrested by having played a complicit role in the use of MP's Public Funded Expenses even if only undertaken by others in Parliament 

ALL MP's & Ministers should be held to account in a UK court of law 

it is no longer right to say that Parliament’s freedom to legislate admits no qualification 

Jackson v. Her Majesty’s Attorney General (2005) per Lord Hope 
the rule of Law enforced by the Courts is the controlling principle upon our constitution is based 

criminal assets 
Proceeds of Crime Act 2002 introduced powers to seize and recover assets is clear and explicit 

complicity in a crime 
an individual is complicit in a crime if he is aware of its occurrence has the ability to report the crime but fails to do so 
as such the individual effectively allows criminals to carry out a crime despite easily being able to stop them 
either directly or by contacting the authorities thus making him a de-facto accessory to the crime rather than an innocent bystander

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
